description: This PHP source file generates an HTML page with embedded JavaScript for the 'Port Triggering Add' feature in a web-based network configuration interface. It includes form validation, user input handling, and AJAX submission to add a new port triggering rule.

methods.name: document.ready
methods.description: Initializes the page, sets up form validation rules, event handlers for the cancel button and save button, and performs input validation before Ajax submission.
